scripts.deploy-contracts: cd contracts && forge script deploy/StakeDeploy.s.sol --ffi --broadcast --rpc-url https://network.ambrosus-test.io --legacy
scripts.stake: cd contracts && forge script scripts/stake.s.sol --ffi --broadcast --rpc-url https://network.ambrosus-test.io --legacy
scripts.withdraw: cd contracts && forge script scripts/withdraw.s.sol --ffi --broadcast --rpc-url https://network.ambrosus-test.io --legacy
scripts.distribute: cd contracts && forge script scripts/distributeReward.s.sol --ffi --broadcast --rpc-url https://network.ambrosus-test.io --legacy
scripts.claim: cd contracts && forge script scripts/claimRewards.s.sol --ffi --broadcast --rpc-url https://network.ambrosus-test.io --legacy
